dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 1
dialogue_turns.text: Should, like, AI be allowed to represent you in court? Or, uh, even draft your legal documents?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Should, like, A I be allowed to represent you in court? Or, uh, even draft your legal documents?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 2
dialogue_turns.text: Oh my gosh, no way! I mean, that's wild.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh my gosh, no way! I mean, that's wild.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 1
dialogue_turns.text: Because get this, this guy, Kenzhebek Ismailov, in Almaty? Yeah? He used ChatGPT to get a traffic fine cancelled.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Because get this, this guy, Kenzhebek Ismailov, in Almaty? Yeah? He used ChatGPT to get a traffic fine cancelled.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: 23-year-old Almaty resident Kenzhebek Ismailov has managed to cancel a fine for violating traffic rules with the help of ChatGPT.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 2
dialogue_turns.text: You're kidding! A traffic fine? That's insane!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: You're kidding! A traffic fine? That's insane!

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 1
dialogue_turns.text: He paid it, actually, uh, first. Like, with the discount.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: He paid it, actually, uh, first. Like, with the discount.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In December last year, Ismailov received a fine of 5,800 tenge with a discount for allegedly violating traffic rules, which he paid.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 2
dialogue_turns.text: He paid it? So then what?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: He paid it? So then what?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 1
dialogue_turns.text: Then he watched the video. Was like, "Nope, this is totally wrong."
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Then he watched the video. Was like, Nope, this is totally wrong.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: However, after analyzing the video recording, he began to doubt the correctness of the punishment imposed.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 2
dialogue_turns.text: Right, exactly! He knew it.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right, exactly! He knew it.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 1
dialogue_turns.text: So he complained to the police, obviously.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So he complained to the police, obviously.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: I filed a complaint against the Almaty Police Department.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 2
dialogue_turns.text: And they rejected it, I bet.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And they rejected it, I bet.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The complaint against the police was rejected, but Ismailov did not give in and filed a lawsuit.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 1
dialogue_turns.text: Of course they did! Yes, exactly! They rejected it.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Of course they did! Yes, exactly! They rejected it.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The complaint against the police was rejected, but Ismailov did not give in and filed a lawsuit.

dialogue_turns.text: So he filed a lawsuit.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So he filed a lawsuit.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The complaint against the police was rejected, but Ismailov did not give in and filed a lawsuit.

dialogue_turns.text: With ChatGPT?!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: With ChatGPT?!

dialogue_turns.text: Yes, exactly! ChatGPT helped him draft the entire claim and documents.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yes, exactly! ChatGPT helped him draft the entire claim and documents.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 2
dialogue_turns.text: Oh my gosh, wait, what?! He won, then?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh my gosh, wait, what?! He won, then?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 1
dialogue_turns.text: He won! The court ruled in his favor and overturned the fine.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: He won! The court ruled in his favor and overturned the fine.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The court ruled in Ismailov's favor and overturned the fine.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 2
dialogue_turns.text: That's unbelievable! He won!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: That's unbelievable! He won!

dialogue_turns.speaker: Speaker 1
dialogue_turns.text: And now he's going for civil court, for compensation.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And now he's going for civil court, for compensation.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Now, after winning the court, Kenzhebek intends to go to civil court to receive compensation.

dialogue_turns.text: Says it's about, like, rights, not money.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Says it's about, like, rights, not money.
